trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents information about C# dynamic operations that are not specific to particular arguments at a call site.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx X$ xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Instances of this class are generated by the C# compiler.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx X$ xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The binder represents a logical AND or logical OR that is part of a conditional logical operator evaluation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx XXX xx xxxxxxx XX xxxx xx xxxx xx x xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The evaluation of this binder happens in a checked context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The binder represents an implicit conversion for use in an array creation expression.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The binder represents an invoke on a simple name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The binder represents an invoke on a specialname.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

There is no additional information required for this binder.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The binder is used in a position that does not require a result, and can therefore bind to a void returning method.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The result of any bind is going to be indexed get a set index or get index binder.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xxx x xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value in this set index or set member comes a compound assignment operator.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
